author: Geoff Dembicki
description:
Bjorn Lomborg has for years promoted the idea that fossil fuels are crucial for humankind through syndicated newspaper columns, best-selling books and appearances on TV shows including HBO’s Real Time with Bill Maher. He’s been called a “friend” by Trump administration energy secretary and former fracking executive Chris Wright and helps advise an anti-net zero organization […]

The post Carbon Capture ‘Not Going to Happen,’ Top Fossil Fuel Advocate Predicts appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Carbon Capture ‘Not Going to Happen,’ Top Fossil Fuel Advocate Predicts
